data.text: @Sean__Last Iâ€™ve always loved Kierkegaard but also binge drinking, so hopefully that puts me in at least the midwit range.
@Bioliberalism @Sean__Last I hadn't heard of this before. I'm curious now.
@Sean__Last I thought IQ was positively correlated with conservatism if you don't control for race and SES?
@Sean__Last So higher iq is associated with income equality??? Of intolerance of income inequality? Which is it?
@Sean__Last Odd that higher IQ people were more readily fooled by vax fearmongering. Though my observation is that unvaxxed were more represented at tails,vaxxed at mean.
@SolarpunkM @Sean__Last I always knew you were a genius, this just confirms it.
@parasociality @Sean__Last A scientific paper that strokes my ego? Must have impeccable methodology and robust replicability
@parasociality @Sean__Last so this is why I did so much mdma in college https://t.co/VMh7AiJG9i
@SolarpunkM Yea, but so are college towns. Lots of stuff to add up to get the total net effect.
